DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot research trial study well Eat , Move , Live ( EML ) work reduce chronic disease risk medically vulnerable community . Obesity , unhealthy diet , physical inactivity link increase cancer risk , especially hormone-related cancer ( example , breast cancer ) . Improving healthy lifestyle practice , namely increase physical activity encourage healthy eating behavior may reduce risk get cancer chronic disease .
DOC.brief_title: Eat , Move , Live Intervention Reducing Chronic Disease Risk Medically Vulnerable Communities
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Level exercise . II . Reduction barrier exercise . III . Level self-reported 5-9 serving fruit vegetable consumption . IV . Reduction barrier fruit vegetable consumption . V. Improvement biologic/metabolic marker hemoglobin A1c , fast plasma glucose , body weight . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 group . GROUP I : Participants complete assessment knowledge , attitude , behavior baseline attend 2 weekday session comprise interactive education segment culturally responsive , base community EML program , topic include : nutrition guideline , nutrition label reading , comparison shopping/grocery store tour , recipe modification healthy food preparation , eat healthy budget , make healthy choice outside home ( e.g. , restaurant ) physical activity 1 hour lead Certified Health Educator ( CHE ) , physical activity conduct Duarte Fitness Centers instructor 30 minute , cooking/taste test demonstration co-led CHE local chef 30 minute 12 week . Participants also prescribe encouraged participate 3 day week exercise class ( > 30 minute ) include salsa , Zumba aerobic exercise provide Duarte Fitness Center . GROUP II : Participants receive fitness tracker track physical activity wait list receive intervention month 10-12 . After completion study , participant follow immediately 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Mothers/female guardian elementary aged student Self identify Latina Not adherent standard > five serving fruit vegetable 150 minute physical activity Not parent elementary age student Duarte Unified School District ( DUSD ) Does selfidentify Latina Does speak/read/write/understand English/Spanish Diagnosed diabetes Consumes 5+ serving fruit vegetable active least 30 minute 5+ day per week Has condition psychological difficulty affect daytoday activity Has physical limitation participate physical activity
